name: Package Delivered
description:
A game where you deliver packages to people remotely, in a dystopian future where all drone delivery technology has failed, and catapults are the last resort.

Game done in 4h for the Triijam 132, for the theme "Package delivered".

  • Music: Yallahs Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) - Licensed under Creative Commons:  By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
  • Font: https://www.dafont.com/arcadepix.font
  • Palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/slso8

All other assets done by @albertnez during the jam.
